title: House for sale in Ampitiya - Kandy
details:
Good Residential Property in Kandy - Ampitiya
Architecturally Designed 2 Storied House around 4000 Sq Ft. situated at Kandy - Ampitiya
Located in calm and quiet, decent residential area
A large garden with a fully grown Coconuts trees, Mango, Jack fruit, Avocado
Car parking over 8 vehicles
Separated servant quarters with bath room & bed room in the real garden

* Ground Floor –
• 1 Bed rooms & attached bath room
• Living area,
• Storage room
• Laundry area

* Upper Floor –• 2 Bed rooms and 2 Attached bath room,
• Pantry & Kitchen,
• Large Hall & Dining area
• Balcony

There is enough the land space available for the developers

Price Rs. 68 Million (negotiable)

Please call for more information
Exclusively sold by -
PAN GLOBAL PROPERTY DEVELOPERS (PVT) LTD
351 ,DUPLICATION ROAD
COLOMBO 03
